channel.title: Pickpocketing... Walking... Bonus's
channel.description:
Does anyone have a basic pickpocketing tutorial so you just do the emote get the item and send the text saying "You Pickpocket the Man" PLEASE
Also, how i make npc's walk i've tried messing around with some stuff in playerhandler and player and autospawn, ANYONE KNOW?!
Also, anyone got any codes i can add for defence and attack bonus's for my armour's and weapon's :D

item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

sigh in autospawn those x-y coards that look like

RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2

set those. your npc will have a square area to walk in
